Ingredients.2: 4 ounces cream cheese, at room temperature

Ingredients.8: 0.5 cup pork rinds, crushed, or more to taste

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).

Directions.2: Combine mozzarella cheese, cream cheese, eggs, Parmesan cheese, garlic powder, oregano, and salt in a bowl. Mix with a hand mixer or an immersion blender until well combined. Add 1/2 cup pork rinds and mix with a spoon until well combined. Add more pork rinds if needed to form a dough.

Directions.3: Form dough into a large disc, or divide into smaller portions if desired. Cover and refrigerate for 10 minutes to make it easier to roll.

Directions.4: Roll dough between 2 large pieces of parchment paper. Transfer to a baking sheet or pizza pan.

Directions.5: Bake in the preheated oven until slightly golden, 15 to 20 minutes. If the crust is greasy, use a paper towel to mop up some of the grease during baking to get a crispier crust.

Directions.6: Remove from the oven and let cool. At this point your crust is ready for topping and final baking.
